artist: Artist: Yokoyama Seiki; Artist: Gantai; Artist: Kitagawa Saigyo; Artist: Kishi Renzan
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Maslon
inscription:
Kaei 6 nen haru(spring of 1853)
Preliminary remarks followed by 19 haiku poemes and 6 kyo_ka poems
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
signed: from right to left: {Seiki ga}, {Gantai}, 祭魚画 {Saigyo ga}, {Renzan ga}, {Bunrin ga}
title: (Plum blossom designs by five artists)
